metadata.title: CVE-2023-50246 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: jq is a command-line JSON processor. Version 1.7 is vulnerable toheap-based buffer overflow. Version 1.7.1 contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: jq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
